verses.verse: <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2296>him,<s%> "Put your belt on your <S%H4975>waist,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> this <S%H6378>vial<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> to Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead.<s%>

When you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7200>there,<s%> find <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi,<s%> and go <S%H935>in,<s%> and make him arise <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H935>carry<s%> him to an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>room.<s%>

Then <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6378>vial<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"' Then <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>door,<s%> <S%H5127>flee,<s%> and <S%H2442>don't<s%> wait."
So the young <S%H5288>man,<s%> even the young <S%H5288>man<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead.<s%>

When he <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H8269>behold,<s%> the captains of the <S%H2428>army<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting.<s%> Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have a <S%H1697>message<s%> for <S%H8269>you,<s%> captain." <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "To which of us <S%H559>all?<s%>" He said, "To <S%H8269>you,<s%> O captain."

He <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house.<s%> Then he <S%H3332>poured<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4886><s%> 'I have anointed you <S%H4428>king<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

You shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> your <S%H113>master,<s%> that I may <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of all the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel.<s%>

For the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%> I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H256>Ahab<s%> everyone who <S%H8366>urinates<s%> against a <S%H7023>wall,<s%> both him who is shut <S%H6113>up<s%> and him who is <S%H5800>left<s%> at large in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> and like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah.<s%>

The <S%H3611>dogs<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> on the <S%H2506>plot<s%> of ground of <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and there shall be none to <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H6605>her.<s%>'" He opened the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

Then <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of his <S%H113>lord:<s%> and one <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7965>him,<s%> "Is all well? Why did this <S%H7696>mad<s%> fellow <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H559>you?<s%>" He said to <S%H3045>them,<s%> "You know the <S%H376>man<s%> and what his talk <S%H7879>was.<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "That is a <S%H8267>lie.<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> us <S%H559>now.<s%>" He said, "He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> 'Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"

Then they <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H899>garment,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it under him on the <S%H1634>top<s%> of the <S%H4609>stairs,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3058>"Jehu<s%> is <S%H4427>king.<s%>"

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H3141>Joram.<s%> (Now <S%H3141>Joram<s%> was <S%H8104>keeping<s%> Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead,<s%> he and all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria;<s%>

but <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> was <S%H7725>returned<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> of the <S%H4347>wounds<s%> which the <S%H761>Syrians<s%> had <S%H5221>given<s%> <S%H3898>him,<s%> when he fought with <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria.<s%>) <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "If this <S%H3426>is<s%> your <S%H5315>thinking,<s%> then let no <S%H408>one<s%> <S%H6412>escape<s%> and go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> it in <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>"

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> rode in a <S%H7392>chariot,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel;<s%> for <S%H3141>Joram<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H274>there.<s%> Ahaziah <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3141>Joram.<s%>

Now the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> on the <S%H4026>tower<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and he <S%H7200>spied<s%> the <S%H8229>company<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> as he <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H8229>company.<s%>" <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> a <S%H7395>horseman,<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> and let him say, <S%H7965><s%> 'Is it peace?'"

So there <S%H3212>went<s%> one on <S%H7392>horseback<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7965><s%> 'Is it peace?'" <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What do you have to do with <S%H7965>peace?<s%> <S%H5437>Fall<s%> in <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H6822>me!<s%>" The watchman <S%H5046>said,<s%> <S%H559><s%> "The <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7725>them,<s%> but he isn't coming back."

Then he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> on <S%H7392>horseback,<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> and said, "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7965><s%> 'Is it peace?'" <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> "What do you have to do with <S%H7965>peace?<s%> <S%H5437>Fall<s%> in behind <S%H310>me!<s%>"

The <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5046>said,<s%> <S%H559><s%> "He <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7725>them,<s%> and isn't coming back. The <S%H4491>driving<s%> is like the <S%H4491>driving<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi;<s%> for he <S%H5090>drives<s%> <S%H7697>furiously.<s%>"

<S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Get <S%H631>ready!<s%>" They got his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H631>ready.<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> him in the <S%H2513>portion<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite.<s%>

It <S%H3088>happened,<s%> when Joram <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> that he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is it <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu?<s%>" He <S%H559>answered,<s%> "What <S%H7965>peace,<s%> so long <S%H5704>as<s%> the <S%H2183>prostitution<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> and her <S%H3785>witchcraft<s%> <S%H7227>abound?<s%>"
<S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> "There is <S%H4820>treason,<s%> <S%H274>Ahaziah!<s%>"

<S%H3058>Jehu<s%> drew his <S%H7198>bow<s%> with his <S%H4390>full<s%> <S%H3027>strength,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> between his <S%H2220>arms;<s%> and the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> at his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he sunk <S%H3766>down<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot.<s%>

Then Jehu <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H920>Bidkar<s%> his <S%H7991>captain,<s%> "Pick him <S%H5375>up,<s%> and <S%H7993>throw<s%> him in the <S%H2513>plot<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite;<s%> for <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H7392>how,<s%> when you and I rode <S%H6776>together<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5375>laid<s%> this burden on <S%H4853>him:<s%>

<S%H7200><s%> 'Surely I have seen <S%H570>yesterday<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H7999><s%> 'and I will repay you in this <S%H2513>plot<s%> of <S%H5002>ground,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Now therefore <S%H5375>take<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him onto the <S%H2513>plot<s%> of <S%H1697>ground,<s%> according to the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

But when <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5127>this,<s%> he fled by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7291>followed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H5221>"Strike<s%> him also in the <S%H4818>chariot!<s%>" They struck him at the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H1483>Gur,<s%> which is by <S%H2991>Ibleam.<s%> He <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and died <S%H4191>there.<s%>

His <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7392>carried<s%> him in a chariot to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his <S%H6900>tomb<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
In the <S%H6240>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3141>Joram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> began <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

When <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H7760>it;<s%> and she painted her <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H3190>attired<s%> her <S%H7218>head,<s%> and looked <S%H8259>out<s%> at the <S%H2474>window.<s%>

As <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> entered <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do you come in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> you <S%H2026>murderer<s%> of your <S%H113>master?<s%>"

He lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who is on my <S%H8147>side?<s%> Who?" Two or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> looked out at <S%H8259>him.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Throw her <S%H8058>down!<s%>" So they threw her <S%H8058>down;<s%> and some of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and on the <S%H5483>horses.<s%> Then he trampled her under <S%H7429>foot.<s%>

When he had come <S%H935>in,<s%> he <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drink;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6485>"See<s%> now to this <S%H779>cursed<s%> <S%H6912>woman,<s%> and bury <S%H4428>her;<s%> for she is a king's <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>"

They <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H4672>her;<s%> but they found no more of her <S%H518>than<s%> the <S%H1538>skull,<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

Therefore they came <S%H7725>back,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him.<s%> He said, "This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3611><s%> 'The dogs will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> on the <S%H2506>plot<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%>

and the <S%H5038>body<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> shall be as <S%H1828>dung<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> so that they shall not <S%H559>say,<s%> "This is <S%H348>Jezebel.<s%>"'"
